text: Chavornay is a municipality of the district of Jura-Nord Vaudois in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 January 2017, the former municipalities of Essert-Pittet and Corcelles-sur-Chavornay merged into the municipality of Chavornay.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 10 January 2017 == References == == Other websites == * Official website * * Category:Municipalities in Jura-Nord vaudois
title: Chavornay, Switzerland
